about_the_game:
WHAT IS THE PEACE EDITION?

Bud Masters - 'Peace Edition' is the free 'NO DECK BUILDING' edition of my somewhat nostalgic indie weed lifestyle deck building card game. It is for casual card game players who like fun card games and weed, without the complexities and time that it takes for 'Building Decks'

Draw cards, and play your cards to deplete your opponent's bud bowl while defending your own bud bowl.

The Bud Masters - 'Peace Edition' is a easy to pick up and play card game with all cards included. All other unlocks are earned through playing the game. There are no in-game purchases or micro-transactions of any kind.



Choose to play against a stoned (yet surprisingly adept AI), or engage in PvP with a (probably) stoned human opponent....

No additional developer or publisher game accounts or sign ups required.

The core game on Steam is all you need to find / connect / play with your pals.

I hope you enjoy my first card game as a game designer / solo-developer. Do let me know if you have fun!

content_descriptors.notes: References to marijuana, it's consumption and it's effects.

short_description: Bud Masters - 'Peace Edition' is a fun, easy to pick up nostalgic weed lifestyle card game. Free from deck building or any additional complexities, 'Peace Edition' is a casual, chill, yet challenging card game with no additional accounts, no micro-transactions or in game purchases required.
